item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, November 7, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Billionaire hedge fund manager lines himself up for Treasury secretary role
2. ‘They don’t understand my life’: what the Democrats misread about America
3. [Opinion] The Democrats threw away a winnable election
4. Harris concedes to Trump but urges supporters to ‘never give up’
5. German government collapses as Scholz sacks finance minister
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, November 7, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
